task.summary: Default task
Rewrote player's progress tokens placement. Use first empty outline or add a new one. Only show 1 progress token outline if Pantheon is enabled.
Tokens refactoring.
ChooseAndPlaceDivinity WIP
ChooseAndPlaceDivinity WIP
Javascript "trait" example using multiple inheritance. Down side is there are multiple js files that do not get merged; this is why we won't break out the States into separate files as in PHP.
Fixed sevenwondersduel.js bookmarks.
Added place Divinity logic & animation
Added place Divinity logic & animation for inactive player
Invert Pantheon spaces for the non-start player.
Update divinities in Pantheon spaces. Move not-chosen divinity back to its deck.
Update player divinities
Return second divinity to deck animation.
Tweaked animation speed / fluidity (start sliding while flipping)
Pass divinitiesSituation in args functions
Add the gate to the Pantheon + Divinities reveal
Pantheon cost indications (incl arrows)
Bugfix: The Conspiracy Treason's action would be logged as if the building was build using Wonder Mausoleum.
Prepared updateDivinitiesSituation for cost/payment data. Refactored Draftpool foreach to use Players/Player objects more efficiently
Tooltips were never using @2X images because they were outside of the #swd div. To fix this we now set a data-swd-quality on the body, which is leading for the @2X css selectors.
Tooltips were never using @2X images because they were outside of the #swd div. To fix this we now set a data-swd-quality on the body, which is leading for the @2X css selectors.
Added Pantheon @2X css/js
Divinities activation cost WIP
Divinities activation cost WIP
Divinities activation cost WIP
Divinities activation cost WIP
Tweaked pantheon board cost & arrow positioning
Activate divinity WIP
Divinity activation discount from Sanctuary Wonder implemented.
Fixed age 2 transition with new divinitiesSituation format
Fixed dangerous bug where $player variable was getting reassigned leading to tokens being attributed to the wrong player.
Divinity activation logic & animation
Bugfix #https://boardgamearena.com/bug?id=31293 wrong Conspiracy name used in log
Rerouted divinity activation to use confirmation/payment dialog (without offering token logic)
Rerouted divinity activation to use confirmation/payment dialog (without offering token logic)
Added coin animation to divinity activation animation
Implemented Divinity Tanit (12 coins reward)
Implemented Divinity Aphrodite (9 VPs) and Mars (2 military shields
Implemented Divinity Baal (Take brown or grey building) and Ishtar (scientific symbol)
Implemented Divinity Hades (Choose and construct discarded building). Agora-fied the Wonder Mausoleum so it uses "actionState" and shouldSkip too.
Implemented Divinity Ra (Steal an opponent’s unconstructed Wonder. Added support for 1 player to have 6 Wonders (when combined with Conspiracy "Extortion").
Implemented Progress Token Mysticism end game points (untested but mostly copy pasted from Progress Token Mathematics)

Grand Temples linked Mythology tokens mechanism + graphics. Tweaked purple column for Pantheon (slightly darker purple + icon & rollover). Implemented Progress Token Mysticism. Fixed paymenttester.php and added mythology tokens and grand temples
Small tweaks (backside of Grand Temple cards, color
Divinities are not free when you have the corresponding mythology token
Fixed mythology decks whitebox width behaviour
Added skeleton for remaining to-be-implemented activeplayer states for Divinities and Wonder The Divine Theater
Added css skeleton for remaining to-be-implemented activeplayer states

Discard Military Token implementation Number military tokens in template (data-military-token-number) for easy click handling / animations Added Player::getStartPlayer() convenience function Added action states of the skeleton state we added in the previous commit(s)
Apply Military Token implementation
